lead_paragraph: Murder charges were filed in the killing of a 9-year-old boy who the police say was lured from a city playground and shot in the head in November.

headline.print_headline: Illinois: Second Man Charged in Killing of Chicago Boy
headline.main: Illinois: Second Man Charged in Killing of Chicago Boy

snippet: Murder charges were filed in the killing of a 9-year-old boy who the police say was lured from a city playground and shot in the head in November.
abstract: Dwight Boone-Doty faces murder charges for November 2015 fatal shooting of 9-year-old Tyshawn Lee, who was believed to be targeted due to his father's gang affiliations, in Chicago; Boone-Doty is second man arrested in connection with Lee's death after Corey Morgan was charged with first-degree murder in late November.
